briefTitle: Use of a Radiolucent Pad to Reduce Mammography Among African Americans
officialTitle: Use of a Radiolucent Pad to Reduce Mammography Among African Americans
primaryOutcomeMeasure: A Pre-Mammography Survey and Post-Mammography Survey to assess anticipated and actual discomfort
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* African American women
* 40 years of age or older who presented for a routine screening mammogram

Exclusion Criteria:

* Males
* race other than African American
* younger than 40 years of age
